record.description: Campaign headquarters staff, April 22, 1925. Third row, left to right: Miss Mielke, Mrs. James, Mrs. Mooney, Miss Jagsch, Miss Hatch, Gilbert Finnegan, Miss Sloan, Fred Stenze, Miss Kubis, Miss Adams, Miss Deputy, Miss Lerner, Miss Weeks, Miss Knoff, Mrs. Riggall; second row: Miss Conklin, Miss Guerin, Miss Charny, Mr. Droege, Miss Renstrom, Miss Hughes, Mrs. Locke, Miss Evans, Miss Lilleberg, Mrs. Lesges, Mrs. Atkinson, Mrs. Brough, Miss Kieffer, Mr. Duncan, Mr. Provinse, Mr. Lane; first row: Mr. Blair, Mr. Croonquist, Dr. Burton, Mr. Moulds, Mr. Fuller, Mrs. McDaniel, Mr. Bright, Mr. Van der Slice.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Separate caption. Refers to U of C. Magazine, 17, no. 2 (Dec. 1924).
